data.name: RPG Maker MZ - City Exterior Tileset
data.detailed_description:
Make your cities more vivid than ever!
This is an assortment of useful exterior objects to make your city feel lively and interesting!
Mob NPC’s breathe vapors, the music of a festival, the hunch of an upcoming incident…
Why not add a touch of expressive, rich colors to your city?

*******************************************
Tiles: 4 files
Sample projects: 1
*******************************************
